728311f-a.text:
Amboy Road, north side, at its junction with Annadale Road, showing the Annadale Hotel. It belonged to A. Britton (1874 to 1887), and later (1898) to Wm. Smith. Still later it was the property of Mrs. 1L. Stacker (1907). The dates refer to maps on
which the owners' names appear.
1923.
P. L. Sperr.
728311f-a.folder: Amboy Road & Annadale Road, Staten Island, NY
